description:
Exclusive Economic Zone and territorial waters of the BCLME (Angola, Namibia, South Africa).
Angola:Creation of 200 nm and 22 nm buffer of baseline (based on third UN conference on Law of the sea), boundary with Namibia at 17d15' (Treaty) and median Kunene river, boundaries with Congo based on Songangol mining areas and map of C&C Technologies.
Namibia:Creation of buffer of 370,4 km (200 nm) and 22,224 km (22 nm) around coastline; for boundaries with neighbouring countries: with Angola according to Treaty 17d15' line
South Africa:Creation of buffer of 370,4 km (200 nm) around coastline.
name: BCLME: EEZ and territorial waters
